Android Gestures - Tutorial
Lars Vogel
2010 vogella GmbH
04.01.2011
Version 0.1
Android Gestures This tutorial describes how to use Gestures and the GestureOverylayVIew in Android. The tutorial is based on Eclipse 3.6, Java 1.6 and Android 2.3 (Gingerbread).
